description:
Hook for jinja templates. If given an `output`, the rendered contents are output to
 a file, otherwise the rendered contents are output as a string.

help.description: A string to display when calling with the `help` argument.
help.title: Help

render_by_default.description: A list of string fields to wrap with jinja braces and render by default.
render_by_default.title: Render By Default

render_exclude.description: A list of field names to not render.
render_exclude.title: Render Exclude

is_public.description: A boolean if hook is public / callable from outside the provider).
is_public.title: Is Public

skip_output.description: A flag to skip the output and not set the key. Can also be set within a hook call.
skip_output.title: Skip Output

kwargs.description: A field name of type dict to map additional arguments to.
kwargs.title: Kwargs

template.description: Path to the template to render relative to `file_system_loader`.
template.title: Template

start_marker.description: Some marker in the template to start replacing the contents within.
start_marker.title: Start Marker

end_marker.description: Some marker in the template to stop replacing the contents within.
end_marker.title: End Marker

start_line.description: The line number to update from. Supersedes marker.
start_line.title: Start Line

extra_context.description: Extra context update the global context to render with.
extra_context.title: Extra Context

render_context.description: A render context that invalidates the default context.
render_context.title: Render Context

additional_context.description: A map to use as additional context when rendering.
additional_context.title: Additional Context

file_system_loader.description: List of paths or string path to directory with templates to load from. [Docs](https://jinja.palletsprojects.com/en/3.0.x/api/#jinja2.FileSystemLoader).
file_system_loader.title: File System Loader

title: FileUpdateHook

description: Hook for updating a section of a document.

help.description: A string to display when calling with the `help` argument.
help.title: Help

render_by_default.description: A list of string fields to wrap with jinja braces and render by default.
render_by_default.title: Render By Default

render_exclude.description: A list of field names to not render.
render_exclude.title: Render Exclude

is_public.description: A boolean if hook is public / callable from outside the provider).
is_public.title: Is Public

skip_output.description: A flag to skip the output and not set the key. Can also be set within a hook call.
skip_output.title: Skip Output

kwargs.description: A field name of type dict to map additional arguments to.
kwargs.title: Kwargs

document.description: Path to a document to render a section of.
document.title: Document

content.description: A string to update within the section of the document
content.title: Content

start_render.description: Marker generally in some kind of comment to begin rendering from.
start_render.title: Start Render

end_render.description: Marker generally in some kind of comment to end rendering from.
end_render.title: End Render

title: UpdateSectionHook

Hook for jinja templates. If given an `output`, the rendered contents are output to
 a file, otherwise the rendered contents are output as a string.

help.title: Help

render_by_default.description: A list of string fields to wrap with jinja braces and render by default.
render_by_default.title: Render By Default

render_exclude.description: A list of field names to not render.
render_exclude.title: Render Exclude

is_public.title: Is Public

skip_output.description: A flag to skip the output and not set the key. Can also be set within a hook call.
skip_output.title: Skip Output

kwargs.description: A field name of type dict to map additional arguments to.

template.description: Path to the template to render relative to `file_system_loader`.

output.title: Output

title: JinjaHook

description:
Hook for generating project outputs. Recursively renders all files and folders in a
 given target directory to an output. If there is a "templates" directory and a file
 or directory that matches the `templates` input param, use that as target. Paths
 to templates and output are cross-platform but should be written with `/` path
 separators.

help.description: A string to display when calling with the `help` argument.
help.title: Help

render_by_default.description: A list of string fields to wrap with jinja braces and render by default.
render_by_default.title: Render By Default

render_exclude.description: A list of field names to not render.
render_exclude.title: Render Exclude

is_public.description: A boolean if hook is public / callable from outside the provider).
is_public.title: Is Public

skip_output.description: A flag to skip the output and not set the key. Can also be set within a hook call.
skip_output.title: Skip Output

kwargs.description: A field name of type dict to map additional arguments to.
kwargs.title: Kwargs

templates.description: Path or list of paths to a templatable directory or file to recursively render the contents.
templates.title: Templates

output.description: Path to put the output file(s).
output.title: Output

copy_without_render.description: List of path to files to only copy and not render.
copy_without_render.title: Copy Without Render

skip_overwrite_files.description: List of files to skip generating over if they exist.
skip_overwrite_files.title: Skip Overwrite Files

render_context.description: A render context that invalidates the default context.
render_context.title: Render Context

extra_context.description: A map / list of maps to use as extra context when rendering. Lists inputs are merged together as lists themselves don't make sense.
extra_context.title: Extra Context

file_system_loader.description: List of paths or string path to directory with templates to load from. [Docs](https://jinja.palletsprojects.com/en/3.0.x/api/#jinja2.FileSystemLoader).
file_system_loader.title: File System Loader

title: GenerateHook
